predicate.note: Frames file for 'adjust' based on initial sentences of big corpus and comparison with 'set' and 'change'

roleset.name: change (slightly)

example.name: simple transitive
example.text: Banks adjusted payouts on CD's in the most recent week.

example.name: with PRP
example.text: All the figures are adjusted *trace* to remove usual seasonal patterns.

example.name: PRP transformed
example.text: All the figures are adjusted for inflation.

roleset.note: Of course, not adjectival usages like "seasonally adjusted unemployment figures"
